title.label: I Love it! I need more!

content.label: I literally love this game. Kinda wish you could replay story missions or at least bosses cause playing as True Incarnatus was fun. I also wish the game would get some more episodes or a sequel cause I love the characters, gameplay, music, story. Never got the chance to play the other Chaos Rings games so it would be cool if they all got brought back and updated graphics so more people could play them. The best mobile RPG in my eyes AND it’s not a free to play or need internet to play, makes the game 10/10. 5 stars for me.

The enix team needs to add compatibility for shared pair of bluetooth wireless gaming control devices such as ps4 controller; bluetooth controls pair to iphone 8+ with share button and sync perfectly with most games GTA FF9 OCEANHORN but not CRIII PLEASE FIX 2020 Update!

Well this used to be one of the best Jrpg’s on mobile. Now it’s just a hot mess. After months of the game being broken from IOS 13, now my save is gone. So to sum it up, Fantastic game, but full of problems.

title.label: One of the Best Mobile RPGs!

content.label: This is still one of the best RPG experiences on mobile. I’m over 45 hours into it and absolutely love it. It’s quite an amazing story with unique character/card customization, and a fun battle mode. The only mobile games I’ve put more time into are DQVIII, MHFU, MHS, FFIX, FFVII, and FFIII.
Was a fan of all 3 loved this one but am unable to play.  Disappointing

Yahoo!! I have been waiting for them to fix this on IOS 13 and they finally have for the most part.. there are blue bars on the left and right side but I don’t care is still one of the best games ever put on a phone!! Also looks great on my iPad Pro 11 a must get!
Basically portable persona 4. Great game worth more than 20$ to be honest

title.label: Was one of the best games for what it was worth.

content.label: It was one of the best games out there.  It would be nice if we have more like it out there and kept up to date for all new and old players who loved the Chaos Rings games. They were all awesome in graphics and storylines.

Unfortunately this game no longer works with ios13 but they are working on a fix 🤞 I hope so this one of the best RPGs to ever grace mobile phones. I really wish I and II could be fixed but they were pulled off the store. 😢
Please bring back I and II as well I will even buy them again. Or do a remaster of them to bring them up to the new devices. Hopefully a fix comes soon in the meantime do not buy it

How do I fix this???

title.label: They are not fixing the game do not buy with iOS 13

content.label: Games unplayable on iOS 13 and it’s been months with their promise to fix it and nothing
The game only shows on half the screen now and it’s unplayable (iPhone 8 plus). Before that it was to me the best rpg on the App Store. Please fix it.

They just don’t make games like chaos rings anymore it’s actually sad to me. I love this series I still play the original three on my older devices and wish I could play them on current devices, I mean I did pay for them, and they are still on my phone, so it’s kinda crazy that they just don’t work I expect more from square enix, though I’ve been disappointed since they ended guardian cross, song summoner, and so many other great games.

Anyway I short review of chaos rings 3 this is the best game on mobile currently, the controls are perfect it was made for mobile so it’s not a crappy port of a better game. The music is beautiful and hits you in all the right places at the right times. Story is a little complicated at times but after you’ve caught up and understand it’s a great story with every character brining a lot to the table, there are no weak characters here, though I may be missing something some storylines seem to be open ended 5 years or so ago I thought they were just leaving it open for the next game, but I don’t think it’s coming. Graphics are really amazing for the time and mobile I would say it’s early ps3 level though some corners are a little blocky and animations could be better. Finally gameplay I love turn based rpgs though I prefer atb style this is alright faster characters get to attack first but it is straight turn based, and I’m not that into the card based level system with the rarities and combining it seems like you were trying to make it seem “freemium” style with out actually being able to pay for it. 

Thank you square for the amazing games please bring back the older games we all love and paid for, and please start making real games again.

Please update this game I’m tired of square Enix games being completely unplayable I mean I paid for the game the least you can do is keep it playable it’s not asking to much even though it seems like with the other chaos rings games there should have been content updates to finish out the world. But really only half of the screen is even displaying now it’s ridiculous.

I had this as a 5 star review before iOS 13 even with the issues I had with it because it was still playable and a great single player full gaming experience I didn’t want to take my frustrations with square Enix out on games that are still great but enough is enough make this game playable again and I will change ratin.
Great game just can’t play anymore due to it being outdated...

I have changed my review, since that display bug that makes the game unplayable happened, when you guys going to fix it? I can’t play from where i stopped last time, and been waiting forever for you to fix it!!
Screen is cut off only half of the game is displayed hopefully it’s fixed so I can update review and see how this game is as it was recommended and did read really good reviews

content.label: Don’t get this if you have a plus model phone. Half the screen is cut off.
Only displays half the screen. Can’t see to play. Can’t change to English (audio) dialogue. Feel like I wasted $20+. I’ve tried and I can’t get any customer support.

title.label: Can’t believe this is a mobile game!!!

content.label: This game looks so amazing! It runs so smoothly the combat is top notch. It’s absolutely perfect

The game deserves 5 stars... when it works. For many, it does not work with iOS 13. I contacted support more than 3 weeks ago. I was told they were working on a fix but they would not be able to offer updates on progress. I’ve been a software developer for decades, and in companies I’ve worked for the translation of that statement is clear:  we don’t know where to find the code, we’re not sure we could build it if we found it, and no one works here any longer who had anything to do with it. The most recent update was 3 years ago. I’m assuming I’ll never be able to play again on my iPhone. And if you folks at SE don’t like this review I will happily change it if you give us a legitimate update with a time frame for a fix. Your behavior thus far is absurd.
Cannot play on iPhone X running iOS 13. Great game! I wish it could be updated so I can play it again.
Will I lose my hard earned progress?!
Love this game but currently I came back to this to finish the game and it didn’t display properly on ios13 fix soon please

Unfortunately, there is a bug thanks to the new iOS 13 update that makes playing this game impossible. All of the game’s controls are still located in their proper place on the screen, but the actual game is being displayed half way down the screen instead of in the center. What I mean is the top half of the screen is black while the bottom half of the screen displays the top half of the game.

It really is a shame because I was 2/3s of the way through the game when I updated my phone. In my naivety, I deleted the app and reinstalled it to no avail. What’s worse, the game’s data saves locally on your phone which means my previous save got wiped when I uninstalled the app. I thought this might happen, but I decided to try regardless because the game is so good that I’m perfectly willing to start over from scratch and play it all again from the beginning. Unfortunately, I sacrificed my save for nothing. The glitch persisted, cementing this $20 purchase as a waste of money.
I really hope SE fixes this game. I’ll change my review if so, but for now you should all just pass on this one.

title.label: Angry That Other Titles Were Removed

content.label: I am very upset that SQEX has removed the previous titles. They were very addicting, and I played them a lot ( until I got iOS 9). Why would they abandon this great series? I say we petition to bring it back.

Square Enix I grew up playing your games, my dad played kingdom hearts my brother played pretty much everything and so am I but please I beg of you do a 15+year fan a favor and rerelease the other games in this series I never was able to finish the first one due to mental health issues and price constraint and I never even got to play the second one so if you could do that for me I would by them in a heartbeat as well as if you could put ff8 on here I love you guys and am looking forward to final fantasy 7 remake and kingdom hearts 3 re:mind and I need something to do while I wait so please and thank you for over a decade of perfect games I love you guys

title.label: Literally the bet mobile game I’ve ever played

The only game that comes close is KOTOR and that’s not even really a mobile game. It’s a port of a console game. Chaos rings has been around for a long time and it’s still better than any game that’s ever featured on iTunes.

title.label: Great game worth the high price.

content.label: I have been playing Square games since the early 90’s. Some of my favorites include Final Fantasy 6 and 7, Chrono Trigger, Xenogears, Secret of Mana and Crisis Core.  Since the days of the ps1 the quality of Square (now Square/Enix) games has nose dived in my opinion. Clear evidence of this can be seen in the countless re-releases of older Square games and spinoffs rather than new original content.  Chaos Rings 3 however has everything I’ve been looking for in a handheld jrpg.  Great, truly original story, gorgeous graphics, an epic soundtrack, characters that develop well throughout the game and become real people you get attached to.... the whole shebang.   But most of all it has a phenomenal turn based battle system that is deep and engaging with enough strategic elements to keep it fresh.  I could not ask more from a 20 dollar game that I can play on my phone.  I’m really hoping that the dark age of Squaresoft is coming to an end and this game is a great indication of that...along with Final Fantasy 15.  I have always enjoyed these games because they are different worlds I can get sucked into and become a part of. Games that spark my imagination and thrill me with great plots, gameplay, characters, and music.  Keep it up guys. No more hallway simulators.  No more games that are all flash and no substance.  If you’re tired of replaying Chrono Trigger or thinking of buying another classic Square game just to have something good on your phone to play....maybe consider this game instead.

Played the whole game to 100% 2 times. Been playing again and again for a year and a half. Get ohz coins by doing quests or 30 at a time by reaching 100 floor of Magma Ocean. This storyline is excellent, better than Dragon Quest 3, better than any Zelda game I have ever played. Better get it now and play while you can. Square Enix likes to take away old chaos rings games.

Some of the content is missing from the Apple Store. In the Google Play Store version of the game, the monsters in the arena go up to level 130 or something. But in my version, the monster levels stop at 58. 

Also, in the GPS version, you have the chance to discover and beat Adam. But, the quest doesn’t show up in the Apple version. Why don’t people talk about these inconsistencies?
I’ve not found any other game as good as this one. I finished it over a year ago and have been looking for a game this good ever since!

title.label: The last bastion from a better age of mobile gaming

content.label: Remember when games on the phone were more than f2p cash grabs and people actually put effort into their games? This game may be the only one of its kind still available today - an AAA mobile gaming experience that tells a great story and has a balanced combat system that's based around tactics.
